title: A hue and cry after the false prophets and deceivers of our age and a discovery of them by their works and fruits and who they are in this age that follow the same spirit, and act the same things as did the false prophets in former generations.
author: Burrough, Edward, 1634-1662.
notes: Attributed by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints to Edward Burrough.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
